overview: Before his gender transition, Gab Meinberg was afraid to face a world of prejudice and bigotry. But as he began this process of finding himself, he came across people on this same journey who brought a lot of love into his life. Transbordando Amor is a short documentary that talks a little about the transition process of a group of trans men, and what they discovered positive in this journey to find themselves.
title: Transbordando Amor
